title: Snow Globe
summaries: The Snow Globe is a Hardmode event-summoning item used to summon the Frost Legion event. The Snow Globe has a 1/15 (6.67%) chance of being obtained from Presents (dropped during the Christmas event) opened specifically in Hardmode worlds. The player also must have at least 200 maximum health to initiate the event, but can then be used in any world at any time afterward.

statistics.Max stack: 9999 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 1 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions)
